snippet: The Orioles, who jumped out to an early lead on Yankees starter Hiroki Kuroda, have made up four games in less than two weeks in the American League East.
abstract: Baltimore Orioles defeat New York Yankees, 6-1, slashing New York's division lead to just two games.
lead_paragraph: The Orioles, who jumped out to an early lead on Yankees starter Hiroki Kuroda, have made up four games in less than two weeks in the American League East.

headline.seo: Orioles Beat Yankees to Trim Lead to 2 Games
headline.main: Giving the Yankees Reason for Pause
headline.print_headline: Giving the Yankees Reason for Pause
